mapper.sql: UserId, UserName, Sex, Birthday, Phone, Email, Address, Job, CarId, Vip, IdentityId, AddTime, UpdateTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( UserName, Sex, Birthday, Phone, Email, Address, Job, CarId, Vip, IdentityId, AddTime, UpdateTime ) VALUES ( #{userInfoEntity.userName}, #{userInfoEntity.sex}, #{userInfoEntity.birthday}, #{userInfoEntity.phone}, #{userInfoEntity.email}, #{userInfoEntity.address}, #{userInfoEntity.job}, #{userInfoEntity.carId}, #{userInfoEntity.vip}, #{userInfoEntity.identityId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ui.UserId AS objectKey, a.totalPrice AS objectValue FROM user_info ui LEFT JOIN (SELECT ore.UserId, SUM(ore.Price) AS totalPrice FROM order_record ore GROUP BY ore.UserId) a ON ui.UserId = a.UserId WHERE YEAR(ui.AddTime) = #{year} ORDER BY a.totalPrice DESC
